Civil Engineer Executive

Posted: 2025-10-10

Expires: 2025-10-24

Active
Attock Petroleum Limited, a leading Oil Marketing Company is looking for Civil Engineer Executive - 𝐑𝐞𝐭𝐚𝐢𝐥 𝐄𝐧𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠 Education: 𝐁𝐚𝐜𝐡𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐫𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐂𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐥 𝐄𝐧𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠 (𝐏𝐄𝐂 𝐑𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐝) Experience: 3 to 7 Years of relevant experience in an Oil Marketing Company (OMC). Locations: 𝐋𝐚𝐡𝐨𝐫𝐞 No. of positions: 01 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐩𝐨𝐧𝐬𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬: The role involves conducting detailed surveys of retail outlets, preparing proposal drawings and cost estimates in coordination with the Retail team and dealers, and ensuring compliance with APL and government standards. It includes coordinating with Head Office and regional teams for necessary approvals such as DCOs, NOCs, and explosive cases, as well as supervising construction activities to ensure timely completion of projects within approved budgets and HSE standards. The position is also responsible for maintaining quality control of civil, electrical, and mechanical works, managing material requests, and overseeing the maintenance of commissioned retail outlets. Additionally, it involves preparing and following up on explosive license renewals, maintaining project documentation and progress reports, using CAD tools for design purposes, and ensuring compliance with all relevant safety and regulatory requirements. The incumbent may also perform any other tasks assigned by the Line Manager or Management. Please send your resume at: jobs@apl.com.pk with mentioning the position and location in the subject line.
📍 Lahore#Civil Engineer Executive🧳 Experienced Required

Replenishment Officer

Posted: 2025-10-10

Expires: 2025-10-24

Active
𝗪𝗲 𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝗛𝗶𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴: 𝗥𝗲𝗽𝗹𝗲𝗻𝗶𝘀𝗵𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗢𝗳𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗲𝗿 We are looking for a Replenishment Officer to join our Supply Chain team at our Warehouse located in Korangi, Karachi. The ideal candidate will be responsible for monitoring stock levels, ensuring timely replenishment of inventory, and coordinating with internal teams to maintain smooth warehouse operations. 𝗘𝗱𝘂𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻:- Bachelor’s degree in Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, or a related field. 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲:- 2–4 years of experience in inventory or replenishment management, preferably in the textile or retail industry. 𝗞𝗲𝘆 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗽𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗲𝘀: - Monitor inventory levels and ensure timely replenishment of products to meet demand. - Coordinate with the procurement and warehouse teams for stock transfers and restocking. - Analyze inventory data to identify slow-moving and fast-moving items. - Prepare and maintain replenishment reports and stock records. - Ensure accuracy in stock management and system updates. - Support in planning and execution of warehouse dispatch operations. 𝗔𝗽𝗽𝗹𝘆 𝗻𝗼𝘄: careers@alrazzaqfibres.com
📍 Karachi#Replenishment Officer🧳 Experienced Required

Junior Video Editor

Posted: 2025-10-10

Expires: 2025-10-24

Active
📢 Now Hiring: Junior Video Editor 📍 Full Time Onsite — Karachi We’re looking for a Junior Video Editor to join our team and help bring ideas to life through engaging, high-quality video content. Job Responsibilities: Edit short-form videos for social media, marketing campaigns, and internal projects. Collaborate with the marketing teams to understand briefs and deliver compelling visuals. Stay updated with the latest editing trends, transitions, and effects to keep content fresh and engaging. Requirements: Basic to intermediate experience with editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, CapCut, or similar). Strong sense of pacing, storytelling, and attention to detail. A portfolio or sample of past work will be a plus. Please send in your resumes to jobs@logicose.com and mention "Video Editor" in subject title.
📍 Karachi#Junior Video Editor🧳 Experienced Required
